content: lace cap sleeve top gauge 15 stitches and 7 row in 4 x4 odd row double_crochet/ch1/double_crochet/skip even row double_crochet/ch1/double_crochet/skip/dc5/skip yarn hobbii diablo in thyme 246 yds- i used 1 5 skeins total- around 370 yds for size xs 5 25/5 5 mm hook front triangles chain a number divisible by 3 *suggestion based on bust size bust 32-33 xs 21 sizepictured 34-35 s 24 36-37 m 27 38-39 l 30 40-41 xl 33 42-44 1x 36/39 46-49 2x 41/44 50-53 3x 47/50/53 row 1 chain 3 more then double_crochet into the 6th stitch chain 1 double_crochet in the same stitch skip 2 stitches and double_crochet in the third stitch chain 1 double_crochet in the same stitch repeat for the entire row in the last stitch only double_crochet once in the stitch instead of twice and don t chain 1 chain 3 and turn your work row 2 in every even numbered row we will have double_crochet clusters where we will double_crochet 5 in every other space rather than double_crochet 2 vs double_crochet in the chain 1 space chain 1 double_crochet in the same space double_crochet 5 times in the next ch1 space double_crochet in the next ch1 space chain 1 double_crochet in the same space continue until the end of the row then double_crochet once in the chain 3 post chain 3 and turn your work row 3 because this is an odd row we will not do any double_crochet clusters and we will only do vs in clusters from the row before double_crochet in the 3rd double_crochet of the next double_crochet cluster ch1 and double_crochet again in the same stitch in ch1 spaces double_crochet in the next ch1 space ch1 then double_crochet in the same space repeat for the rest of the row then double_crochet in the last chain 3 post chain 3 and turn your work row 4 we will begin decreasing now remember on even numbered row double_crochet clusters should only go above the previous clusters from 2 row previous to decrease skip the first ch1 space and double_crochet a cluster or a v in the next ch1 space depending on what stitch is underneath from your row 2 then continue following the pattern from row 2 chain 3 and turn your work row 5 this is an odd numbered row so we will only be doing vs and not double_crochet clusters repeat the instructions for row 3 not skipping any spaces row 6 we will begin decreasing again remember on even numbered row double_crochet clusters should only go above the previous clusters from 2 row previous to decrease skip the first ch1 space and double_crochet a cluster or a v in the next ch1 space depending on what stitch is underneath from your row 2 then continue following the pattern from row 2 chain 3 and turn your work row 7 this is an odd numbered row so we will only be doing vs and not double_crochet clusters repeat the instructions for row 3 not
